titleStmt.title: The vnfouldyng of sundry vntruths and absurde propositions latelye propounded by one I.B. a greate fauourer of the horrible heresie of the libertimes.
titleStmt.author: T. W. (Thomas Wilcox), 1549?-1608.

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: An answeare to B. the Libertine.
Cropped at foot, affecting some signatures; some print show-through.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
